title: Schema for ATT&CK Groups - X MITRE Data Component

id.description: A unique identifier for the MITRE data component.

type.description: The type of object, 'x-mitre-data-component' is type 'bundle'

spec_version.description: The version of the STIX specification used to represent the content in this Bundle.

id.description: A unique identifier for the MITRE data component.

created.description: The date and time the data component was first created.

created_by_ref.description: Specifies the ID of the Identity object that describes the entity that created this object.

modified.description: The date and time this version of the data component was last modified.

name.description: A string identifying the data component.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Data Component, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

x_mitre_version.description: The version of the object in format major.minor

x_mitre_attack_spec_version.description: Optional: This field tracks the version of the ATT&CK Spec used by the object.

x_mitre_modified_by_ref.description: The identity of the individual or organization which created the current version of the object.

x_mitre_deprecated.description: Optional: Whether the object has been deprecated

x_mitre_domains.description: The domains the object is found in.

revoked.description: (STIX v2.0 optional common property) Whether the object has been revoked.
